children.name: zookeeper:10.0.5
children.description: Apache ZooKeeper provides a reliable, centralized register of configuration data and services for distributed applications.

children.name: kafka:18.0.5
children.description: Apache Kafka is a distributed streaming platform designed to build real-time pipelines and can be used as a message broker or as a replacement for a log aggregation solution for big data applications.

name: schema-registry:4.0.3
description: Confluent Schema Registry provides a RESTful interface by adding a serving layer for your metadata on top of Kafka. It expands Kafka enabling support for Apache Avro, JSON, and Protobuf schemas.
